backend/main.mo: Implements a booking system with services, appointment creation, validation, and retrieval using a map store.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature definitions, associated files, components, and test IDs for the salon web app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based design tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling for the site.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry template loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app with a theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Booking form component handling user input, validation, service selection, and backend appointment creation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with brand details, quick links, contact info, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with desktop and mobile menus, navigation links, and call/booking CTAs.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page wrapper that renders Navbar, routed content via Outlet, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Member: Animated section showcasing membership benefits with icons and a CTA link.
frontend/src/components/marketing/OfferB: Simple promotional banner displaying a limited-time offer.
frontend/src/components/media/BeforeAfte: Image slider for before/after transformations with navigation buttons and indicators.
frontend/src/components/media/GalleryGri: Responsive grid displaying gallery images with hover zoom effect.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqAcco: Accordion list of frequently asked questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Scroll-animated grid highlighting major salon services with icons and link to services page.
frontend/src/components/sections/Stylist: Section featuring stylist profiles with photos, titles, and bios.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Animated testimonials section showing client reviews with star ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookAppointment.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook to book appointments via an actor and refresh appointment data with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider using Dfinity AuthClient to manage identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Provides an intersection‑observer‑based hook that reveals elements when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark mode values, typography, and utility classes for animations and gold accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the salon’s About page with animated sections, story content, stylist section, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ContactBookingPage.ts: Displays a booking form and salon contact details with animated scroll effects and WhatsApp booking support.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery page with animated header, image grid, and before/after slider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, offers, sections for highlights and testimonials, and scroll‑revealed animations.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the services page with animated headers and categorized service cards using Tailwind and custom components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, design requirements, features, and image needs for the Baidees Salon website build.
